meanings.definition: A passage for entering a place.
meanings.sent1: The entryway to the park was lined with colorful flowers.
meanings.sent2: Please take off your shoes in the entryway.
meanings.sent3: The entryway to the library was guarded by a friendly cat.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was the entryway to her warm personality.
meanings.sent5: The grand entryway of the mansion left visitors in awe.

meanings.sent1: His entryway into the room was met with applause.
meanings.sent2: The entryway of the new employee brought fresh ideas to the team.
meanings.sent3: The magician's entryway onto the stage was filled with smoke and sparkles.
meanings.sent4: The melody served as the entryway to the emotional song.
meanings.sent5: The entryway of the hero into the battle was met with cheers from the crowd.
